Title: Pilot
Writer: Damon Lindelof (written for television by), Tom Perrotta (written for television by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Tom Perrotta (based on the book by)
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Liv Tyler
Plot: The police chief faces struggles in both his personal and professional life, as the third anniversary of the departure approaches.
